EmailTemplate.name: 02/04/2014 Term 3 School Lunches (Foundation)
EmailTemplate.subject: Security in Chiang Mai
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Below is the link to the lunch menu for term 3.
https://school.my.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004TB2/CymgZkh3dhtLGBSqg7.e8A9HPK4DR7jbzXe7eyg9TBQ=
Please would you kindly make your selections and return the complete menu to Sabrina at service@britishschool.edu.my no later than Friday 11th April. You can also hand it in at the school reception.
Your cooperation is very much appreciated.
Regards Admin Team British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
